title_job: OpenShift Specialist Needed for Banking Client in Mumbai
description: We are looking for an experienced OpenShift professional based in Mumbai for an urgent project with a banking customer. The ideal candidate should be able to deploy, troubleshoot, and manage OpenShift clusters independently. This is a critical role requiring immediate joining to ensure smooth operations. If you have a strong background in OpenShift and can work effectively under pressure, we want to hear from you!
